樚字的基本解释

樚
lù
〔樚木〕醉鱼草，落叶灌木，小枝四棱而稍有翅，叶对生，长椭圆状披针形，结蒴果，花和叶揉碎投水中，可使鱼麻醉，茎叶可做农药。
〔樚栌〕同“辘轳”，安在井上绞起汲水斗的器具。

樚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lù］
［《集韻》盧谷切，入屋，來。］
(1)见“樚木”。
(2)见“樚櫨”。

樚字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　樚； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页550第13
【集韻】【韻會】?盧谷切，音六。【韻會】樚櫨，井上汲水器。【庾信·述懷詩】道險臥樚櫨。　又木名。亦作鹿。【酉陽雜俎】武陵郡北，有鹿木二株，馬伏波所種，木多節。　又【玉篇】徒谷切。同櫝。匱也。

樚字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
樚字的起名意思

樚木。

Ming
Basic explanation of words
Ming
lù
〔Jimu〕 Buddleja, deciduous shrub, branchlets are four-sided and slightly winged, leaves opposite, oblong-lanceolate, bear capsules, flowers and leaves are crushed and thrown into water to numb fish, stems and leaves can be used pesticide.
〔樚栌〕Same as "Roller", it is an appliance that is installed on the well to wind up the water-drawing bucket.
Ming
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lù］
["Ji Yun" Lu Guqi, enter the house, come. ]
(1) See "樚木".
(2) See "樚栌".
Ming
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　樚; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 550 13
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Lu Guqie, sound six. 【Yunhui】Yuyi, well water pump. 【Xin Yu·Shuhuai Poetry】The road is dangerous.　Also wooden name. Also known as a deer. 【Youyang Miscellaneous】In the north of Wuling County, there are two deer trees, planted by Ma Fubo, with many knots.　[Jade articles] Tuguqie again. The same. Deficient.
